572120.name: Fantasy Grounds -  Black Scroll Games - Forest of Fallen Giants (Map Pack)
572120.description:
Forest of Fallen Giants (Map Pack)

Who were they, how did they get here and most important, what kind of creatures have been drawn here by the death and remains of eldritch spells that fill the area? It’s the area that sane people stay away from.
This set includes:
  • 1 sunlit map
  • 1 night map
  • 24 sunlit mini-maps
  • 24 night mini-maps
  • Works with any ruleset!
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Antal Keninger
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: AAW Games[/b]
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
